subject: Management
title: Innovation Culture
description: A quick win: understand Innovation Culture.

hook.text: 3M's 15% time policy produced the Post-it Note. Google's 20% time produced Gmail.

buildup.text: Innovation requires slack: time and space to experiment without immediate pressure for results.

discovery.text: Cultures that punish failure kill innovation. Every breakthrough was preceded by many failed attempts.

twist.text: You can't mandate innovation. You can only create the conditions where it's safe to try.

climax.text: Celebrate experiments, not just successes. Fund small bets. Let people pursue curiosity.

punchline.text: Innovation lives where failure is safe and curiosity is funded.

quiz.question: What cultural condition is most essential for innovation?
options: Safety to experiment and fail without punishment
Strict deadlines that force creative solutions
Hiring only people with proven innovation track records
